name: Wilson
text:
Wilson
Wilson was a field agent of the Federal Bureau of Investigation based in Las Vegas, Nevada.
Biography
Agent Wilson excitedly forwarded a call to Randall Headley from Deputy Director Gordon Cole requesting information on two Las Vegas residents, Douglas and Jane Jones, wanted in connection with a double murder. Wilson expressed doubt upon hearing that there were over twenty-three people named Douglas Jones in the metropolitan area, but Headley, slamming his hand on the desk, furiously shouted that this was part of their job as FBI agents.
Wilson later brought Headley to a Douglas and Jane Jones that had been brought in for questioning. However, they turned out to be the incorrect Joneses, as they had multiple children.
